attributes.action: No to British troops in Ukraine now or in the future
attributes.background: NATO and the EU are unadvisedly pressuring countries to prolong the hostilities between Russia and the Ukraine. Thousands have already died in a conflict that needs negotiation not escalation. President Trump is seeking a negotiated end to the war and NATO and the EU and UK should support that.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Don't send troops to Ukraine to support peacekeeping
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705814
